description: This procurement is for a construction contract for replacing a cooling unit located in the Sainte-Anne des-Plaines complex at the Regional Reception Center Institution. The procurement is competitive with all interested suppliers able to submit a bid. The contract is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the construction period is expected to be 12 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

## Requirements

*   **Tender Description (English)**:  
    *   The Correctional Service of Canada requires a general contractor for a project involving the supply of labour, equipment, and materials to replace a cooling unit located in the Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines complex at the Regional Reception Center Institution.

    *   The objectives of this project are to replace the existing cooling unit and conduct all necessary work, including replacing the cooling coil connected to the cooling unit and the refrigeration piping between the unit and the coil.
